mapping.sql: SELECT T1."时间",T1."时段",T1."厂家",T1."BSC号",T1."基站号",T1."厂商侧 CELLID",T1."扇区号",T1."扇区名称", T1.STRENGTH1 as "C/I接入区间[0,+∞)次数", T1.STRENGTH2 as "C/I接入区间[-5,0)次数", T1.STRENGTH3 as "C/I接入区间[-∞,-5)次数", DECODE(T1.ALLNUM, 0, 0, ROUND(T1.STRENGTH1 * 100 / T1.ALLNUM, 2)) AS "C/I接入区间[0,+∞)比例", DECODE(T1.ALLNUM, 0, 0, ROUND(T1.STRENGTH2 * 100 / T1.ALLNUM, 2)) AS "C/I接入区间[-5,0)比例", DECODE(T1.ALLNUM, 0, 0, ROUND(T1.STRENGTH3 * 100 / T1.ALLNUM, 2)) AS "C/I释放区间[-∞,-5)比例", T2.STRENGTH1 as "C/I释放区间[0,+∞)次数", T2.STRENGTH2 as "C/I释放区间[-5,0)次数", T2.STRENGTH3 as "C/I释放区间[-∞,-5)次数", DECODE(T2.ALLNUM, 0, 0, ROUND(T2.STRENGTH1 * 100 / T2.ALLNUM, 2)) AS "C/I释放区间[0,+∞)比例", DECODE(T2.ALLNUM, 0, 0, ROUND(T2.STRENGTH2 * 100 / T2.ALLNUM, 2)) AS "C/I释放区间[-5,0)比例", DECODE(T2.ALLNUM, 0, 0, ROUND(T2.STRENGTH3 * 100 / T2.ALLNUM, 2)) AS "C/I释放区间[-∞,-5)比例" FROM (select T0.START_TIME,T0.NE_CELL_ID,to_char(T0.START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "时间", to_char(T0.START_TIME,'HH24') AS "时段", CASE NE.VENDOR WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0804' then '中兴' when 'ZY0810' then '阿朗' else '' end "厂家", NE.BSC AS "BSC号", NE.BTS AS "基站号", NE.LOCALBTS AS "厂商侧 CELLID", NE.CELL AS "扇区号", NE.CELL_NAME AS
